summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff implements multiple changes (footer redesign, canonical marketing content updates, and static export HTML generation changes). With no requirements, nothing can be verified as missing; several implemented features appear unrequested relative to the empty BuildRequest.
